short_summary: 36-Month Lease for a High-Capacity Printer for RCMP F Division
full_summary:
---

**Government Tender Announcement:**
**SSC 2BP3-129061/B - 36 Month Lease for a High-Capacity Printer for RCMP F Division - Amendment 003**
=====================================================================================================

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

** Tender Description **

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) F Division has a requirement for a 36-month lease, plus two (2) one (1) year option periods, for two (2) monochrome (black and white) production-rated printers and one (1) colour production printer.

The objectives of the contract are to supply, deliver, and install the necessary equipment, as well as provide training in French and English, allowing users to access all the required features of the equipment. 

The mandatory technical specifications are outlined in Annex A. SSC's Pre-Bid Compliance Process (PCCP) applies to this solicitation.

**Key Dates**

- **Publication Date**: July 17th, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: August 1st, 2023 at 12:00 pm (Eastern Standard Time)
- **Delivery Date**: Within 30 days from contract award

**Contact Information**

For further information or to request a debriefing, please contact Katherine Ikeson at:

**katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca**
- **Phone**: 613-298-2147
- **Fax**: 613-123-4567

**Attachments**

The following documents are available for download:

- SSC 2BP3-129061/B - 36 Month Lease for a High-Capacity Printer for RCMP F Division- Amendment 003.pdf
- etc...

**Contracting Entity Information**

- **Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada
- **Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

This tender has already expired. You can no longer participate. Thank you.
